1249700.name: Warspace
1249700.description:
Warspace is a game inspired by the arcade classic games. Travel through the Galaxy, shooting aliens ships and gaining points on the adventure. Be prepared for the final battle and try to keep alive! Try to eliminate the enemy ship as much as you can to have more, fire speed, move speed, shield and money.


FEATURES:
  • 75 designed levels
  • Blow up thousands of enemies
  • Powerful upgrades
  • Battle heavily armed bosses
  • The best old - school climate
1249700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
